basicmod:Strike.NAME: 打击
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Good for attacking enemies early in combat.

basicmod:Guiyi.NAME: 归一
basicmod:Guiyi.DESCRIPTION: 造成手牌数量3倍的伤害
basicmod:Guiyi.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成手牌数量5倍的伤害
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The more cards in your hand, the stronger this attack.

basicmod:DiscardDrawFive.NAME: 深思
basicmod:DiscardDrawFive.DESCRIPTION: 弃五5张牌摸5张牌 消耗
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: A swingy tactical card — can refill your hand after a big discard.

basicmod:Fireball.NAME: 火球术
basicmod:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: 对敌方全体造成 !D! 点伤害 消耗.
basicmod:Fireball.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 对敌方全体造成 !D! 点伤害 消耗.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Unleash a burst of fiery magic at all foes.

basicmod:DefenseConversion.NAME: Defense Conversion
basicmod:DefenseConversion.DESCRIPTION: Discard all Skill cards in your hand. Gain !B! Block for each card discarded. Exhaust.
basicmod:DefenseConversion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard all Skill cards in your hand. Gain !B! Block for each card discarded. Exhaust.

basicmod:TacticalReorder.NAME: Tactical Reorder
basicmod:TacticalReorder.DESCRIPTION: Discard half of your hand (rounded down). Draw !M! cards.
basicmod:TacticalReorder.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard half of your hand (rounded down). Draw !M! cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Plan ahead by cycling your hand efficiently.

basicmod:ReactiveGuard.NAME: Reactive Guard
basicmod:ReactiveGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you played an Exhaust card this turn, gain 5 additional Block.
basicmod:ReactiveGuard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you played an Exhaust card this turn, gain 5 additional Block.

basicmod:DrawPenaltyPowerCard.NAME: Power Surge
basicmod:DrawPenaltyPowerCard.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, draw 1 less card. Gain 3 Strength and 3 Dexterity. Upgrade: 4 Strength and 4 Dexterity.

basicmod:EndOfTurnAOECard.NAME: Inferno Burst
basicmod:EndOfTurnAOECard.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn for 3 turns, deal 10 damage to all enemies. Upgrade: 4 turns.

basicmod:StrengthBoostCard.NAME: Strength Boost
basicmod:StrengthBoostCard.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 2 Strength. Upgrade: 3 Strength.

basicmod:InspirationFlow.NAME: 灵感涌现
basicmod:InspirationFlow.DESCRIPTION: 在每回合开始时，额外抽 !M! 张牌

basicmod:PageFragment.NAME: 残页
basicmod:PageFragment.DESCRIPTION: 从弃牌堆中选择一张牌，将其加入手牌。本回合保留该牌 消耗 保留
basicmod:PageFragment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 从弃牌堆中选择两张牌，将它们加入手牌。本回合保留这些牌 消耗 保留

basicmod:SlashingInsight.NAME: 后发制人
basicmod:SlashingInsight.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。若本回合打出过牌，下回合多抽 1 张牌
basicmod:SlashingInsight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。若本回合打出过牌，下回合多抽 1 张牌
